name: Galaxy Scavenger
description:
Description

Galaxy Scavenger is a top-down shooter game which player is a treasure hunter who seeks rare artifact. 

Feature :

  1. Randomized level for each playthrough from 9 different template
  2. Boss Fight with 3 phase and 3 different attack pattern
  3. Upgrade your character from the power up that drop from levels

How to play:

  • Use "w", "a", "s", "d" or the arrow key to control the character.
  • Aim with your mouse and left click to shoot.
  • Collect power ups to help you along the way.
  • Clear every enemy in the room.
  • Go to the door on the top of the room to proceed to the next room.

Development Team:

  1.  Mohammad Ahnaf Zain Ilham
  2. Ezza Ardiala
